quest.name: Simply to Dye For
journal: Alys would ask you to speak with a troubled patron.

While normally delighted by the company of her patrons at the Seventh Heaven, Alys is at a loss about how to console a particular customer. Eginolf, a renowned craftsman and regular at the tavern, has been more than voracious with his drinking of late, and Alys suspects he is beleaguered with work-related problems. To put an end to his troubles, and preserve the decorum of her establishment, she asks that you speak with him, that his mind may be put at ease. Make your way to Rowena's House of Splendors and speak with Eginolf to discover the cause of his distress.

You speak with Eginolf, and discover the source of his troubles is an arduous undertaking at the behest of his employer, the trader Rowena. Tasked with creating a new line of wares, the likes of which the realm has never known, he was at a loss as to how he could fulfill his duty to her. Meeting you, however, has inspired a return to the basics, that he may better tailor his wares to the adventurers who would purchase them. As thanks, he offers to dye your artifact armor any color you desire. After acquiring the necessary augmentation item, try speaking with his assistant, Kakalan.

dialogue.name: ALYS
dialogue.text: Ah, well if it isn't Forename. Just the adventurer I was hoping to see.

dialogue.name: ALYS
dialogue.text: Do you know of the blacksmith Eginolf? He's quite an accomplished craftsman. In fact, anyone who's had dealings with Rowena is sure to have come across his creations.

dialogue.name: ALYS
dialogue.text: It's always been a pleasure to have him as a regular here at the Seventh Heaven, but he's been quite irritable of late, and practically drowning in his cups, besides. I fear his recent work, or perhaps a lack thereof, may have something to do with it.

dialogue.name: ALYS
dialogue.text: This may seem but a trifling matter to someone as traveled as yourself, but it would mean so much to me if you would speak with him. I can think of no one better to offer him a word or three of encouragement.

dialogue.name: ALYS
dialogue.text: You can find him just down the way at the Diamond Forge within Rowena's House of Splendors. I do pray his predicament is nothing serious.

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text:
Can't ye see I'm thinkin', lasslad? Off with ye!
...Hm? Alys sent ye, did she?

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text: <scoff> And I suppose she just happened to mention me contract with Rowena, eh?

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text: I thought she'd be satisfied with me vintage gear. There was a time it practically flew off the shelves, bringin' in 'venturers with tomestones by the bucket. But now...

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text: Ye damned divas are a fickle lot, and apparently none o' ye'll be caught dead in me stuff no more. Now I've got Rowena jumpin' down me throat, clamorin' for summat new. Summat the realm ain't heretofore seen...

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text: The woman expects too bloody much, I tell ye! But if I don't fill me contract, she'll have thugs fittin' me feet fer lead boots. If only I pissed out bright ideas each dawn like I did me ale...

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text: Hold yer horsebirds! I...I know ye from somewhere... Yer one of them 'venturers what started the bloody relic armor movement way back when, ain't ye? As I live an' breathe!

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text: Tried as I might─and holy hells, did I try─I wasn't quite able to recreate them masterworks. There was summat about 'em─a certain quality even the great Eginolf weren't goin' to match. I s'pose one never truly can rival the classics, eh?

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text: Ah, Alys, ye sly shrew. That's why you sent this one.

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text: Ye wanted herhim to remind me of the old days when armorcraft was about the armor, and naught else. Somewhere along the way, I reckon I got caught up in the hurly-burly and lost me way.

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text: Ye know, I reckon it's high time I got back to basics─focus more on who'll be wearin' me gear than the pretty tail on that Miqo'te sellin' me the parts. Might be then I can come up with summat what'll satisfy ol' Rowena. Cheers, lasslad. 'Twas kind of ye to stop by.

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text: And while yer here, how about I fix up yer own set o' relic gear? Mine assistant Kakalan here can augment each and every piece...

dialogue.name: EGINOLF
dialogue.text: 'Course, that's assumin' ye can bring him the proper parts. I ain't runnin' a charity. Don't go forgetting yer gear, neither.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may now trade with Kakalan. After obtaining the appropriate augmentation item, you can exchange it along with artifact armor for augmented artifact armor, which, unlike regular relic armor, can be dyed any color of your choice.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that the augmentation item required will vary depending on the artifact armor you wish to exchange.
